name: purgatory (itch) (algatrazcpt)
description:
Our character is between death and the living, no matter what he does, he cannot die and always rewinds. He spends time in purgatory, slaughtering small creatures.

Player Move Control(A-D)

Player Jump(SPACE)

Player Attack(W)

Using Assets
